name: mind_testing_game
description: --- ## *Hey there! 😄 Got a cool challenge for you! It's not just a game, it's a knowledge test with MCQs and true/false questions. Pick one right answer for each within limited time. It's more than fun – helping the environment while boosting your brainpower! Remember, a person's mind is defined by their knowledge. Ready to play? 🌍🧠*
